python_framework_type.description: The framework this service will use. e.g. Flask, Django, FastApi, etc.

kubernetes_namespace.description: The namespace for kubernetes to create workers and execution pods. Only relevant to spawner and health. Meaning the config should be changed on each new namespace to match.

container_backend.description: Container backend to use when creating workers/execs.

spawner_host_id.description: Unique host_id for worker host. Each host should have at least one spawner and health check worker.

spawner_host_ip.description: An addressable IP for the spawner's host. (Not currently used)

spawner_max_cmd_length.description: Maximum number of messages that the autoscaler should put on the default command channel.

spawner_abaco_conf_host_path.description: Sets abaco conf host path if it is not set by environment variable

web_access_control.description: Type of access control for web front end.

web_user_role.description: The role required for 'base level' access to the service. Only used with JWT access control.

web_accept_nonce.description: Enables use of nonce for auth with API. x-nonce param is only checked in absence of a JWT header.

web_apim_public_key.description: Public key for the apim instance when deployed behind apim (jwt access control)

web_show_traceback.description: Whether the web apps return a stacktrace or a nice JSON object on an APIException.

web_case.description: Either to use camel or snake case. Changes return responses. Default is snake.

global_tenant_object.description: Object containing global parameters which tenants may overwrite at times.

log_ex.description: Default amount of time, in seconds, before a log is deleted from Mongo DB.

log_ex_limit.description: Ceiling for custom log_ex able to be set for a tenant.

web_max_log_length.description: Max length (bytes) to store an actors exec's logs. Truncated otherwise. Cannot exceed max mongo doc len.

use_tas_uid.description: Whether or not to use tas for authentication.

actor_uid.description: If using uid and gid, what uid globally should be set as.

actor_gid.description: If using uid and gid, what gid globally should be set as.

default_token.description: Default value for an actor's token attribute. Set globally.

generate_clients.description: Whether or not to generate clients when creating workers.

actor_homedir.description: Allows for specification regarding an actors homedir to use.

log_ex.description: Default amount of time, in seconds, before a log is deleted from Mongo DB.

log_ex_limit.description: Ceiling for custom log_ex able to be set for a tenant.

use_tas_uid.description: Whether or not to use tas for authentication for tenant.

actor_uid.description: If using uid and gid, what uid by tenant should be set as.

actor_gid.description: If using uid and gid, what gid by tenant should be set as.

default_token.description: Default value for an actor's token attribute. Set per tenant.

generate_clients.description: Whether or not to generate clients when creating workers for this tenant.

actor_homedir.description: Allows for specification regarding an actors homedir to use for this tenant.
